title: Britney Spears shares video of her thorough outdoor yoga workout in an aqua string bikini
text:
She's been hitting her workouts hard, and has regularly posted fitness updates to her social media.

Pop icon Britney Spears uploaded a new gymnastics and yoga-inspired workout session with fitness guru boyfriend Sam Asghari to her Instagram on Sunday, showing the singer in various elaborate poses that had her hanging upside down as well as walking up and down stairs — on her hands.

Spears, 37, was reveling in her ability to enjoy an outdoor workout session this late into the autumn in Southern California, captioning her share with 'Only in LA can you wear a bathing suit in October! It’s so beautiful out .... and first time to walk on my hands up and down stairs ..... ☘️☘️'

Working it: Pop icon Britney Spears uploaded a new gymnastics and yoga-inspired workout session with fitness guru boyfriend Sam Asghari to her Instagram on Sunday

Upside down: The video showed the singer in various elaborate poses that had her hanging upside down as well as walking up and down stairs — on her hands

In the sped-up video Britney shared to her feed, the Piece Of Me songstress is shown in a sexy bright aqua string bikini, assisted by her beau Sam as they engage in acro-yoga style poses that included backbends, handstands, camel pose and more.

In the beginning, Britney balanced in the air on Asghari's feet as he lied on the ground, while she performed backbends and raised first one leg in the air, then the other, and then both.

They also mirrored each other in mutual camel poses, before sitting facing each other with their legs splayed to stretch out each other's hip joints.

After some further deep backbends, Britney and Sam take to the top of an outdoor stairwell so that she can practice not only her handstand, but also walking on her hands, both down the stairs and then back up again.

Happy: Spears, seen here a year ago in October, was reveling in her ability to enjoy an outdoor workout session this late into the autumn in Southern California

She captioned her share: 'Only in LA can you wear a bathing suit in October! It’s so beautiful out .... and first time to walk on my hands up and down stairs ..... ☘️☘️'

The pair also engaged in partner shoulder stretches, as they stand back to back facing away from one another, clasp hands and then lean away from each other.

Asghari, 25, has been Spears' boyfriend for almost three years, after meeting on the set of her 2016 music video for Slumber Party.

They have regularly shared footage and images of their fitness routines, including a similar clip from just last week.

Acrobatic: In the sped-up video Britney shared to her feed, the Piece Of Me songstress is shown in a sexy bright aqua string bikini, assisted by her beau Sam

Athletic couple: They engaged in poses that included handstands and more

After a somewhat difficult year, in which Britney's father had severe health problems which ultimately led her to take a long break from working, she took a rest from being in the spotlight as well.

The break also meant that she canceled certain commitments pertaining to her latest Las Vegas residency.

However things have been looking up for the Toxic hitmaker recently, after a romantic, fun and restorative trip to Hawaii with Sam and her evidently committed return to working out to maintain her taut bod.

Another activity: This one involved the twosome sitting facing each other with their legs splayed

description: She's been hitting her workouts hard, and has regularly posted fitness updates to her social media. Britney Spears uploaded a new outdoor workout session on Sunday, in a bikini.
